info.title: Microsoft Playwright Testing Service Reporting Data Plane API

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description:
Supported Azure Playwright Service reporting API Endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example:
  https://{region}.reporting.api.playwright.microsoft.com).

x-ms-client-request-id.description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

parameters.description: Mandatory runId for the test results.

AccessLevel.description: Access levels for test results URL.

AccountTestRunStats.description: Summary statistics of test run in a workspace.

cloudExecutionRuns.description: Cloud Executed runs within a workspace

AttachmentKind.description: Types of attachments uploaded for a test result

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

BrowserType.description: Supported browser types for running tests

branch.description: Branch name in the source code repository.

revisionUrl.description: URL linking to the revision details in source code repository.

CloudReportingSummary.description: Model representing summary of test run results.

startTime.description: Start time of the test run in datetime(RFC 3339 literal format).

endTime.description: End time of the test run.

serverStatus.description: Run status of the test results on the service.

passedTestsCount.description: Number of passed tests in the test run.

failedTestsCount.description: Number of failed tests in the test run.

skippedTestsCount.description: Number of skipped tests in the test run.

flakyTestsCount.description: Number of flaky tests in the test run (tests that passed on retry).

jobs.description: List of CI jobs associated with the test run.

projects.description: List of Playwright [projects](https://playwright.dev/docs/test-projects) associated with the test run.

tags.description: List of tags associated with tests in the test run.

CloudRunSummary.description: Model representing summary information about a test run.

billableTimeInMs.description: Billed time for the test run, available once the test run has ended

totalTimeInMs.description: Total time taken for the test run.

browserSessionsCount.description: Number of browser sessions used in the test run.

browserQuotaExceeded.description: Flag indicating whether the test run was throttled due to reaching the maximum allowed parallel browser limit for the workspace.

value.description: The TestResultDetails items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The TestRun items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

startTime.description: Start time of the test execution- RFC 3339 literal format

artifactsPath.description: Relative path of test artifacts in storage.

ResultsStats.description: Summary statistics of test results in a run.

ShardDetails.description: Model representing a shard. Learn about Playwright sharding [here](https://playwright.dev/docs/test-sharding)

ShardDetailsCreateOrUpdate.description: Model representing a shard. Learn about Playwright sharding [here](https://playwright.dev/docs/test-sharding)

ShardExecutionDetails.description: Execution details of a Playwright shard within the test run.

shardId.description: Shard Id for the shard- indexed 1,2,3 etc.

summary.description: Summary of the test run shard.

workersCount.description: Number of workers used by playwright client.

uploadCompleted.description: Flag indicating if upload is complete for the shard.

TestResultDetails.description: Details of a single test result.

testCombinationId.description: Identifier for the test combination. A test combination represents a specific test within a project.

lineNumber.description: Line number for the test in the file.

retryCount.description: Number of retries for the test.

status.description: Status of the individual test execution. The status cannot be 'flaky' for upload

durationInMs.description: Duration of the test execution in milliseconds.

startTime.description: Start time of the test execution.- (RFC 3339 literal format)

previousRetries.description: Previous retry summaries: Retires are uploaded separately but grouped on the service, accessible as a single entity via the GET API.

tags.description: List of tags associated with the test result.

annotations.description: List of annotations (https://playwright.dev/docs/test-annotations) for the test result.

artifactsPath.description: Relative path in storage for all the artifacts of the test

TestResultsUrl.description: Model representing a test results URL.

createdAt.description: Creation timestamp of the test results URL- RFC 3339 literal format

expiresAt.description: Expiration timestamp of the test results URL- RFC 3339 literal format

accessLevel.description: Access level for the test results URL.

TestRun.description: Model representing detailed information about a test run.

displayName.description: Display name of the test run in the portal (unicode characters allowed).

creationTime.description: Creation time of the test run -RFC 3339 literal format

creatorId.description: Creator's identifier. It's the Id referred in the access/Entra token

cloudRunSummary.description: Summary of the cloud-hosted browser run. Only available if cloud run is enabled

cloudReportSummary.description: Summary of reports uploaded on cloud. Only available if cloud reporting is enabled

testRunConfig.description: Playwright client configuration for the test run.

cloudRunEnabled.description: Flag indicating if test run is using cloud-hosted browsers (cloud run).

cloudReportingEnabled.description: Must be set to true when users want to use reporting feature

repeatEach.description: The number of times to repeat each test, useful for debugging flaky tests.

testFramework.description: Details of the test framework used.

shardDetails.description: Details of the shards used in the test.

testType.description: Type of test being executed (default: WebTest).

testSdkLanguage.description: Programming language used for the test SDK.

repeatEach.description: The number of times to repeat each test, useful for debugging flaky tests.

testFramework.description: Details of the test framework used.

shardDetails.description: Details of the shards used in the test.

testType.description: Type of test being executed (default: WebTest).

testSdkLanguage.description: Programming language used for the test SDK.

TestRunCreateOrUpdate.description: Model representing detailed information about a test run.

displayName.description: Display name of the test run in the portal (unicode characters allowed).

creationTime.description: Creation time of the test run -RFC 3339 literal format

testRunConfig.description: Playwright client configuration for the test run.

cloudReportingEnabled.description: Must be set to true when users want to use reporting feature

values.name: Running
values.description: The test run is currently in progress.

values.name: ClientComplete
values.description: The test run completed on the client side.

values.name: ServerComplete
values.description: The test run completed on the server side.

branches.description: List of CI branches for a testrun

values.name: Flaky
values.description: The test was flaky (passed in retry).

startTime.description: Start time of the test run in datetime(RFC 3339 literal format).

endTime.description: End time of the test run.

uploadMetadata.description: Metadata related to test run uploads.

testResultsCount.description: Total number of test results uploaded in the test run.

totalAttachmentsCount.description: Total number of attachments uploaded in the test run.

totalAttachmentsSize.description: Total size of attachments uploaded in the test run (bytes).

UploadTestResultsRequest.description: Request object for uploading test results.

WebTestConfig.description: Configuration details for the web test.

jobName.description: Name of the CI job running the test.

projectName.description: Name of the Playwright project to which the test is associated.

browserType.description: Name of the browser running the test.

os.description: Operating system where the browser is hosted.

Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.name: x-ms-client-request-id
Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

Azure.Core.FilterQueryParameter.name: filter
Azure.Core.FilterQueryParameter.description: Filter the result list using the given expression.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.name: maxpagesize
Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.description: The maximum number of result items per page.

Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.name: skip
Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to skip.

Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.name: top
Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to return.
